text: David X. Cohen (born July 13, 1966), born David Samuel Cohen, is an American television writer. He has written for The Simpsons. He also runs and is the main writer for Futurama. == Other websites == * * * IGN Interview With David X. Cohen * Interview with David X. Cohen about the return of Futurama * An Interview About Math in Futurama with David X. Cohen, by Dr. Sarah Greenwald Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:American screenwriters Category:Writers from New Jersey
title: David X. Cohen
